strapiPost.title: OZ Kids Bike & Book Fest Is This Weekend
strapiPost.content:
The second annual OZ Kids Bike & Book Festival is in the Bentonville Public Library’s backyard this weekend. 

  • Party at the library: The event is on Saturday, July 2, from 9-11:30a and will showcase activities for all ages. There will be a giant inflatable slide and landing pad, a Strider Bikes’ introductory skills course, a family-friendly yoga class, face painting, crafts, live music, and food! 
  • Read and go: The library will have a book giveaway of popular titles and host a princess for storytime. Pedal it Forward is providing bikes to 75 kids at the event, contributing to the event finale of biking to the Bentonville Square.

Click HERE to RSVP for the free event.
